title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 525.7 - Notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 525.7 - Notice of hearing

State Regulations

The claimant, his or her attorney, and all material and
necessary parties, shall be notified in writing of the time, place and purpose
of any hearing, as well as the evidence to be produced by the claimant or other
parties. The notice shall be mailed not less than 10 days before the date of
the hearing. In the discretion of the office any issue may be considered and
determined, although not indicated in the notice of hearing, if the
administration of justice will thereby be substantially
served. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
525.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
